query:
-- Map recipe categories to ingredient categories
UPDATE ingredients 
SET category = CASE 
  WHEN category = 'Sushi Rolls' THEN 'Fish & Seafood'
  WHEN category = 'Specialty Items' THEN 'Fish & Seafood'
  WHEN category = 'Ingredient' THEN 'Produce'
  WHEN category = 'Toppings & Garnishes' THEN 'Toppings & Garnishes'
  WHEN category = 'Sauces & Condiments' THEN 'Sauces & Condiments'
  ELSE category
END
WHERE restaurantId = 1
AND category IN ('Sushi Rolls', 'Specialty Items', 'Ingredient');
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 49cxSE1jUeHq7LY.root --database KMmUaMc2BgFeVkUfVYZGPD --execute 
-- Map recipe categories to ingredient categories
UPDATE ingredients 
SET category = CASE 
  WHEN category = 'Sushi Rolls' THEN 'Fish & Seafood'
  WHEN category = 'Specialty Items' THEN 'Fish & Seafood'
  WHEN category = 'Ingredient' THEN 'Produce'
  WHEN category = 'Toppings & Garnishes' THEN 'Toppings & Garnishes'
  WHEN category = 'Sauces & Condiments' THEN 'Sauces & Condiments'
  ELSE category
END
WHERE restaurantId = 1
AND category IN ('Sushi Rolls', 'Specialty Items', 'Ingredient');
